Engineering Faculty of Engineering and Applied Science Contact information 2000 Simcoe Street North Oshawa, Ontario L1G 0C5 Office: SIR 3385 905.721.8668 ext. 5387 905.721.3370 (fax) masoud.makrehchi@ontariotechu.ca Research topics Natural Language Processing Artificial Intelligence Machine Learning Text and Data Mining Social Computing Mining Social Networks and Complex Systems Network Science Moral AI Education PhD (Electrical and Computer Engineering), University of Waterloo, Canada, 2007; MSc (Computer Engineering), Shiraz University, Iran, 1994; BSc (Electrical Engineering), Iran University of Science and Technology, Iran, 1991. Research and expertise Work experience Honours and awards Industrial: Thomson Reuters, Senior Research Scientist, 2008 to 2012. Academic: Postdoctoral fellow, University of Waterloo, 2007 to 2008. NSERC Postgraduate Scholarship (PGS-B), 2003 to 2004; University of Waterloo President's Graduate Scholarship, 2003 to 2004; Ontario Graduate Scholarship, 2003; Ontario Graduate Scholarship in Science and Technology, 2006; University of Waterloo Alumni Scholarship, 2006; University of Waterloo Graduate Scholarship, 2005; University of Waterloo Faculty of Engineering Graduate Scholarship, 2003, 2004; International Conference on Social Computing, Behavioural-Cultural Modeling, and Prediction (SBP) Challenge Award, Apr. 2012.
